dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I mutter my thoughts aloud, but Prince seems to not even notice me.

dialogue.name: Prince
dialogue.dialogueText: I knew it when I saw you staring down at me! You clearly are something special!

dialogue.name: Prince
dialogue.dialogueText: That hollow gaze of indifference! That scrawny body! That seething sense of self-righteousness! You have all the makings of a knight!

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Why does everybody feel the need to treat me like crap all of the time!? I mean the indifference I get, but scrawny body? Self-righteousness? He just jumped here to insult me!

dialogue.name: Prince
dialogue.dialogueText: Ah you seem confused! Well I suppose that is to be expected. You see my name is Eric and I am the Prince of a humble, but beautiful western country.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: A small western country? A prince? Come on this is all getting a bit ridiculous isnâ€™t it?

dialogue.name: Prince
dialogue.dialogueText: In my country we hold the esteemed values of old in the highest regard. That is why we still keep Knights around...though admittedly it is more or less a title and nothing more.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: He started to go on some tirade about how great his country is...
